data.title: 971 Area Code | Portland Local Phone Numbers
data.meta_description: Get an 8x8 local phone number for area code 971. Connect with customers in Portland. Learn more with this guide.
data.text:
Portland commonly known as “City of Roses” is the largest and most populated city in the state of Oregon, USA and the seat of Multnomah County. It has many beautiful green spaces and parks, including Forest Park, the largest urban forest in the United States. It is known for its beautiful scenery, delicious food, craft beverages, and friendly people. Portland was named Best American city in 2013.

The 971 area code covers both businesses and residents in the Portland metro area. The 971 area code is for landline, wireless and VoIP customers. A virtual business phone number in the 971 area code can help you establish a local business presence in the Portland metro area. With 8x8 business phone solutions, you can better serve your Portland-based clientele.

Wholesale trade is one of the city's major sources of revenue, with import and export shipments of approximately $15.4 billion annually.

Portland's major industries include manufacturing, tech and healthcare. Portland also has the highest number of athletic apparel and outdoor recreation companies in the country. Companies like Columbia Sportswear and Nike are locally headquartered in Portland. Others have North American headquarters in Portland, including Adidas and Leatherman.

971 Area Code At a Glance

At nearly 650,000 in 2017, Portland is the most populous city in Oregon. The Portland metro area has a population of 2.47 million people. While Portland has seen tremendous growth in the last decade, it's starting to show signs of slowing down. Despite a growth rate of only 0.9% for 2018, Portland is still worth considering when it comes to new business opportunities. Portland is one of the most diverse cities in the state.

Businesses can establish a presence in this area by getting a local phone number from 8x8.

971 Area Code Location History

The 971 area code was put into place on October 1, 2000. It was created from the area code 503 and now serves as an overlay in the region. Area code 971 covers several cities, including Portland, Salem, Gresham, Hillsboro, Beaverton, Aloha, Tigard, Lake Oswego and Keizer.

Surrounding area codes include those in Vancouver, Eugene, OR and Spokane, WA.

971 Area Code Map

How to Call a 971 Area Code Phone Number

Here’s how to make a phone call to a 971 area code phone number:

Dial 971, the area code.

Dial the 7-digit phone number.

Area Codes Near the Portland Area Code 971

Vancouver, WA - 360 / 564

Eugene, OR - 458 / 541

Portland, OR - 503 / 971

Spokane, WA - 509

Why Should I Get a 971 Area Code Phone Number For My Business?

The 971 area code serves the Portland area in Oregon, USA. If you are a business, looking to break into the Oregon market, it’s crucial to have a local phone number that customers recognize and can call without paying for long-distance. A virtual phone number with a 971 area code will help you get your foot in the door.
